name: Fine Line
description:
Reach your goals by solving puzzles from switching 2 worlds between heaven and hell.

Controls (Browser/HTML5 for PC)
Arrow keys - movement
E - invert world
A - pull
Space bar - jump
P - pause

Controls (Downloadable)
Arrow keys - movement
E - invert world
A - pull
Space bar - jump
Escape - pause

It has mobile support on HTML, button output will display upon tapping the screen.

Disclaimer:

The web-based version of Fine Line is prone to audio glitches and for reliable audio use the download executables.
